page.title: 12BOVINGDON BAPTIST
page.content: Mr. Webster is the lay pastor of Bovingdon Baptist church. The Websters have been at Bovingdon Baptist for 18 months. When they came, the church was just about to close. It only had three members who could not keep the church going. Mr. Webster originally came from Bushey but took early retirement and joined the preaching team in Bovingdon. On October 18th 1983 Mr. Webster was baptised. About 35 people go to a normal meeting on Sunday morning. There are ten juniors. There are 50 people in all that come. But there are only 7 committed members. When Mr. and Mrs. Webster first came there were only 3 members in the church all in their 70's and one was born on Christmas Day. The people who go to the church are mainly from Bovingdon.
